title: Should we publish a roadmap on the Stabilize website?
body:
The Stabilize team has been very active and made a lot of progress, but it is hard for new users to get an overview of the progress. 

Infos about the progress are posted on a daily basis on TG & twitter, and also published on medium, but an easy to find overview on the Stabilize website may help new users to make up their mind more quickly about the progress of Stabilize protocol, and the usage of the pools. 

For example, this roadmap / timeline could list the existing pools, pools under development, pools under further investigation, with brief explanation & link to medium articles or proposals with further infos.
The roadmap could further display important listings in defi & crypto listing sites, portfolio tracking services, a.s.o.

As an alternative, the website could also link to frequently updated medium articles about the progress, similar to the existing "learn" link.
choices: Yes, please publish a roadmap on stabilize.finance
A "Progress" link to medium articles is better
No, it's sufficient how progress is shared
author: 0x63Dbf00C99EaD0635FF5aDf2fd2f1F7F2141fc7C
